name: Authentic Thousand Island Dressing
author: A Local 1000 Islander
summary: Many variations of this recipe exist, but this version has been a favorite in Alexandria Bay, NY (the Heart of The Thousand Islands) for nearly 50 years.
ingredients: ½ cup diced red bell pepper
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop
In a medium bowl, whisk together the chopped eggs, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, vinegar, cloves, mayonnaise, relish, olives and red pepper until evenly blended
Chill and serve spooned over fresh greens
